EmailTemplate.description: Wbnr - Financial Services: The True Cost of Performance
EmailTemplate.name: NA_Commercial_Financial Services_Cold_Nurture.FinancialServices_Cold_Nurture_Com
EmailTemplate.subject: Financial Services: The True Cost of App Performance [FREE Webcast]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-webinar-series-best-practices-for-financial-services/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
In a highly competitive industry, it’s no wonder financial services organizations like yours are investing billions into complex IT systems to run their business – but how can you ensure that your organization is getting the most of your investments while also preventing downtime?
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-webinar-series-best-practices-for-financial-services/]]>
By watching this webinar, you will uncover:
- Unique challenges facing financial services organizations
- Implications of current industry trends faced by FiServ IT teams
- How financial organizations can enhance, scale, and assure performance on cloud operations while maximizing on-prem investments with Turbonomic
We hope you find this helpful!
Regards,
Team Turbonomic
